hyperbole.definition: exaggeration, things NOT to be taken literally

alexithymia.definition: inability to identify and express or describe one's feelings

zeitgeist.definition: the defining spirit or mood of a particular period of history as shown by the ideas and beliefs of the time

atavistic.definition: relating to or chatacterised by reversion to something ancient or ancestral

egalitarian.definition: believing in or based on the principle that all people are equal and deserve equal rights and opportunities
